Package application

package application
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    application.viewControllers
     
  • Class
    Description
    AppStarter
    This will start the application to run the main file
    CalendarApp
    This calendar app is used to create a javafx window for the calendar The objects that use this function are the dashboard controller, patients directory, patient info view and the db connector This relies on the calendar fx library
    CreateEncryptedPdf
    This will create a PDF containing the patients information and save it to the computer This object is used in the Patient Info View controller for the patients details and medication PDF
    CredentialManager
    This is used to add a user to the database, verify the password, verify the OTP and anything to do with the user credentials
    DataEncryptorDecryptor
     
    DBConnector
    This class was created to handle all the queries to the mySQL database
    Decryptor
    This class is used for the DB connector
    EmailManager
    This class is used for the user creation and UI
    EncryptionController
    This is used in the UI
    LoginResult
    This class is used in the password reset, login controller and credential manager
    Main
    This is used in the app starter
    Medication
    This is used in the dashboard, patient info view and encrypt PDF
    OTPService
    This uses the google xing library for qrcode This is used in the user creation and credential manager
    PasswordHash
    This class is used in the password hasher, and credential manager
    PasswordHasher
    This class is used in the credential manager
    Patient
    This is used in the patient service, patient info view, dashboard encrypted PDF, patient directory, login controller, and UI
    PatientService
    This is used in the login controller, patient info view, dashboard and directory
    UI
    This might be redundant, need to verify
    UsernameStorage
    This may be redundant
    UserSession
    This is used in the password reset, login controller, patient info view dashbaord, main and directory
